doorethy_intro.name: Doorethy
doorethy_intro.text: Oh, you want through? Prove you're CULTURED. Simon Says time, darling.

doorethy_mock_1.name: Doorethy
doorethy_mock_1.text: Wow, look at you following rules. Good puppy.

doorethy_mock_2.name: Doorethy
doorethy_mock_2.text: My grandmother could do this faster. She's dead.

doorethy_mock_3.name: Doorethy
doorethy_mock_3.text: Still going? I'm impressed. Well, not really.

doorethy_wrong_round_9.name: Doorethy
doorethy_wrong_round_9.text: OH NO! You were SO CLOSE! Back to Round 1, sweetheart.

doorethy_hurt_3.name: Doorethy
doorethy_hurt_3.text: Please... I'm just doing my job...

doorethy_victory.name: Doorethy
doorethy_victory.text: Fine. You're... adequate. You may pass.
